# componentsToDisplay(forPath:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an array of strings representing the user-visible components of a given path.

## Declaration

```swift
func componentsToDisplay(forPath path: String) -> [String]?
```

## Parameters

- **path**: A pathname.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] objects representing the user-visible (for the Finder, Open and Save panels, and so on) components of `path`. Returns `nil` if path does not exist.

## Discussion

These components cannot be used for path operations and are only suitable for display to the user.

## Getting and setting attributes

- **displayName(atPath:)**: Returns the display name of the file or directory at a specified path.
- **attributesOfItem(atPath:)**: Returns the attributes of the item at a given path.
- **attributesOfFileSystem(forPath:)**: Returns a dictionary that describes the attributes of the mounted file system on which a given path resides.
- **setAttributes(_:ofItemAtPath:)**: Sets the attributes of the specified file or directory.
